content:
Martevius listens to music while he does homework each day.

He recorded the number of songs he listened to and how long (in hours) he spent on his homework for five days this week.
  
|||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --:
**Songs** | $23$ | $11$ | $18$ | $27$ | $19$
**Time (hours)** | $2$ | $1$ | $1.5$ | $3$ | $2$ 
  
**Plot the data in a scatterplot.**
